006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.impl.AbstractArrayItem;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.impl.ArrayItemN;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItemVisitor;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IItemType;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
018
019import java.util.ArrayList;
020import java.util.Collection;
021import java.util.Collections;
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.ListIterator;
024import java.util.Set;
025import java.util.function.BiConsumer;
026import java.util.function.BinaryOperator;
027import java.util.function.Function;
028import java.util.function.Supplier;
029import java.util.stream.Collector;
030import java.util.stream.Stream;
031
032import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
033
034/**
035 * A representation of a Metapath array item type.
036 * <p>
037 * Instances of this interface are required to enforce non-mutability for array
038 * contents.
039 *
040 * @param <ITEM>
041 *          the Metapath item type of array members
042 */
043@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.ShortMethodName", "PMD.ExcessivePublicCount" })
044public interface IArrayItem<ITEM extends ICollectionValue> extends IFunction, IItem, List<ITEM> {
045  /**
046   * Get the type information for this item.
047   *
048   * @return the type information
049   */
050  @NonNull
051  static IItemType type() {
052    return IItemType.array();
053  }
054
055  @Override
056  default IItemType getType() {
057    return type();
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * Get an empty, immutable array item.
062   *
063   * @param <T>
064   *          the item Java type
065   * @return an immutable map item
066   */
067  @NonNull
068  static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> empty() {
069    return AbstractArrayItem.empty();
070  }
071
072  @Override
073  List<ITEM> getValue();
074
075  @Override
076  default boolean hasValue() {
077    return true;
078  }
079
080  @Override
081  default ISequence<?> contentsAsSequence() {
082    return ISequence.of(ObjectUtils.notNull(stream()
083        .flatMap(ICollectionValue::normalizeAsItems)));
084  }
085
086  @Override
087  default Stream<IAnyAtomicItem> atomize() {
088    return ObjectUtils.notNull(stream().flatMap(ICollectionValue::atomize));
089  }
090
091  /**
092   * Determine if this sequence is empty.
093   *
094   * @return {@code true} if the sequence contains no items, or {@code false}
095   *         otherwise
096   */
097  @Override
098  default boolean isEmpty() {
099    return getValue().isEmpty();
100  }
101
102  /**
103   * Get the count of items in this sequence.
104   *
105   * @return the count of items
106   */
107  @Override
108  default int size() {
109    return getValue().size();
110
111  }
112
113  @Override
114  default boolean contains(Object obj) {
115    return getValue().contains(obj);
116  }
117
118  @Override
119  default Object[] toArray() {
120    return getValue().toArray();
121  }
122
123  @Override
124  default <T> T[] toArray(T[] array) {
125    return getValue().toArray(array);
126  }
127
128  @Override
129  default boolean containsAll(Collection<?> collection) {
130    return getValue().containsAll(collection);
131  }
132
133  @Override
134  default ITEM get(int index) {
135    return getValue().get(index);
136  }
137
138  @Override
139  default int indexOf(Object obj) {
140    return getValue().indexOf(obj);
141  }
142
143  @Override
144  default int lastIndexOf(Object obj) {
145    return getValue().lastIndexOf(obj);
146  }
147
148  @Override
149  default ListIterator<ITEM> listIterator() {
150    return getValue().listIterator();
151  }
152
153  @Override
154  default ListIterator<ITEM> listIterator(int index) {
155    return getValue().listIterator(index);
156  }
157
158  @Override
159  default List<ITEM> subList(int fromIndex, int toIndex) {
160    return getValue().subList(fromIndex, toIndex);
161  }
162
163  /**
164   * A {@link Collector} implementation to generates a sequence from a stream of
165   * Metapath items.
166   *
167   * @param <T>
168   *          the Java type of the items
169   * @return a collector that will generate a sequence
170   */
171  @NonNull
172  static <T extends ICollectionValue> Collector<T, ?, IArrayItem<T>> toArrayItem() {
173    return new Collector<T, List<T>, IArrayItem<T>>() {
174
175      @Override
176      public Supplier<List<T>> supplier() {
177        return ArrayList::new;
178      }
179
180      @Override
181      public BiConsumer<List<T>, T> accumulator() {
182        return List::add;
183      }
184
185      @Override
186      public BinaryOperator<List<T>> combiner() {
187        return (list1, list2) -> {
188          list1.addAll(list2);
189          return list1;
190        };
191      }
192
193      @Override
194      public Function<List<T>, IArrayItem<T>> finisher() {
195        return list -> ofCollection(ObjectUtils.notNull(list));
196      }
197
198      @Override
199      public Set<Characteristics> characteristics() {
200        return Collections.emptySet();
201      }
202    };
203  }
204
205  @Override
206  default ISequence<? extends IArrayItem<ITEM>> toSequence() {
207    return ISequence.of(this);
208  }
209
210  @SuppressWarnings("null")
211  @Override
212  default Stream<? extends IItem> flatten() {
213    return stream()
214        .flatMap(ICollectionValue::flatten);
215  }
216
217  /**
218   * Get a new, immutable array item that contains the items in the provided list.
219   *
220   * @param <T>
221   *          the item Java type
222   * @param items
223   *          the list whose items are to be added to the new array
224   * @return an array item containing the specified entries
225   */
226  @NonNull
227  static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> ofCollection( // NOPMD - intentional
228      @NonNull List<T> items) {
229    return items.isEmpty() ? empty() : new ArrayItemN<>(items);
230  }
231
232  /**
233   * Returns an unmodifiable array item containing zero elements.
234   *
235   * @param <T>
236   *          the item type
237   * @return an empty {@code IArrayItem}
238   */
239  @NonNull
240  static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> of() {
241    return AbstractArrayItem.empty();
242  }
243
244  /**
245   * Returns an unmodifiable array item containing one item.
246   *
247   * @param <T>
248   *          the {@code IArrayItem}'s item type
249   * @param e1
250   *          the single item
251   * @return an {@code IArrayItem} containing the specified item
252   * @throws NullPointerException
253   *           if the item is {@code null}
254   */
255  @NonNull
256  static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> of(@NonNull T e1) {
257    return new ArrayItemN<>(e1);
258  }
259
260  /**
261   * Returns an unmodifiable array item containing two items.
262   *
263   * @param <T>
264   *          the {@code IArrayItem}'s item type
265   * @param e1
266   *          the first item
267   * @param e2
268   *          the second item
269   * @return an {@code IArrayItem} containing the specified items
270   * @throws NullPointerException
271   *           if an item is {@code null}
272   */
273  @NonNull
274  static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> of(@NonNull T e1, @NonNull T e2) {
275    return new ArrayItemN<>(e1, e2);
276  }
277
278  /**
279   * Returns an unmodifiable array item containing three elements.
280   *
281   * @param <T>
282   *          the {@code IArrayItem}'s item type
283   * @param e1
284   *          the first item
285   * @param e2
286   *          the second item
287   * @param e3
288   *          the third item
289   * @return an {@code IArrayItem} containing the specified items
290   * @throws NullPointerException
291   *           if an item is {@code null}
292   */
293  @NonNull
294  static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> of(@NonNull T e1, @NonNull T e2, @NonNull T e3) {
295    return new ArrayItemN<>(e1, e2, e3);
296  }
297
298  /**
299   * Returns an unmodifiable array item containing four items.
300   *
301   * @param <T>
302   *          the {@code IArrayItem}'s item type
303   * @param e1
304   *          the first item
305   * @param e2
306   *          the second item
307   * @param e3
308   *          the third item
309   * @param e4
310   *          the fourth item
311   * @return an {@code IArrayItem} containing the specified items
312   * @throws NullPointerException
313   *           if an item is {@code null}
314   */
315  @NonNull
316  static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> of(@NonNull T e1, @NonNull T e2, @NonNull T e3, @NonNull T e4) {
317    return new ArrayItemN<>(e1, e2, e3, e4);
318  }
319
320  /**
321   * Returns an unmodifiable array item containing five items.
322   *
323   * @param <T>
324   *          the {@code IArrayItem}'s item type
325   * @param e1
326   *          the first item
327   * @param e2
328   *          the second item
329   * @param e3
330   *          the third item
331   * @param e4
332   *          the fourth item
333   * @param e5
334   *          the fifth item
335   * @return an {@code IArrayItem} containing the specified items
336   * @throws NullPointerException
337   *           if an item is {@code null}
338   */
339  @NonNull
340  static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> of(@NonNull T e1, @NonNull T e2, @NonNull T e3, @NonNull T e4,
341      @NonNull T e5) {
342    return new ArrayItemN<>(e1, e2, e3, e4, e5);
343  }
344
345  /**
346   * Returns an unmodifiable array item containing six items.
347   *
348   * @param <T>
349   *          the {@code IArrayItem}'s item type
350   * @param e1
351   *          the first item
352   * @param e2
353   *          the second item
354   * @param e3
355   *          the third item
356   * @param e4
357   *          the fourth item
358   * @param e5
359   *          the fifth item
360   * @param e6
361   *          the sixth item
362   * @return an {@code IArrayItem} containing the specified items
363   * @throws NullPointerException
364   *           if an item is {@code null}
365   */
366  @NonNull
367  static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> of(@NonNull T e1, @NonNull T e2, @NonNull T e3, @NonNull T e4,
368      @NonNull T e5, @NonNull T e6) {
369    return new ArrayItemN<>(e1, e2, e3, e4, e5, e6);
370  }
371
372  /**
373   * Returns an unmodifiable array item containing seven items.
374   *
375   * @param <T>
376   *          the {@code IArrayItem}'s item type
377   * @param e1
378   *          the first item
379   * @param e2
380   *          the second item
381   * @param e3
382   *          the third item
383   * @param e4
384   *          the fourth item
385   * @param e5
386   *          the fifth item
387   * @param e6
388   *          the sixth item
389   * @param e7
390   *          the seventh item
391   * @return an {@code IArrayItem} containing the specified items
392   * @throws NullPointerException
393   *           if an item is {@code null}
394   */
395  @NonNull
396  static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> of(@NonNull T e1, @NonNull T e2, @NonNull T e3, @NonNull T e4,
397      @NonNull T e5, @NonNull T e6, @NonNull T e7) {
398    return new ArrayItemN<>(e1, e2, e3, e4, e5, e6, e7);
399  }
400
401  /**
402   * Returns an unmodifiable array item containing eight items.
403   *
404   * @param <T>
405   *          the {@code IArrayItem}'s item type
406   * @param e1
407   *          the first item
408   * @param e2
409   *          the second item
410   * @param e3
411   *          the third item
412   * @param e4
413   *          the fourth item
414   * @param e5
415   *          the fifth item
416   * @param e6
417   *          the sixth item
418   * @param e7
419   *          the seventh item
420   * @param e8
421   *          the eighth item
422   * @return an {@code IArrayItem} containing the specified items
423   * @throws NullPointerException
424   *           if an item is {@code null}
425   */
426  @NonNull
427  static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> of(@NonNull T e1, @NonNull T e2, @NonNull T e3, @NonNull T e4,
428      @NonNull T e5, @NonNull T e6, @NonNull T e7, @NonNull T e8) {
429    return new ArrayItemN<>(e1, e2, e3, e4, e5, e6, e7, e8);
430  }
431
432  /**
433   * Returns an unmodifiable array item containing nine items.
434   *
435   * @param <T>
436   *          the {@code IArrayItem}'s item type
437   * @param e1
438   *          the first item
439   * @param e2
440   *          the second item
441   * @param e3
442   *          the third item
443   * @param e4
444   *          the fourth item
445   * @param e5
446   *          the fifth item
447   * @param e6
448   *          the sixth item
449   * @param e7
450   *          the seventh item
451   * @param e8
452   *          the eighth item
453   * @param e9
454   *          the ninth item
455   * @return an {@code IArrayItem} containing the specified items
456   * @throws NullPointerException
457   *           if an item is {@code null}
458   */
459  @NonNull
460  static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> of(@NonNull T e1, @NonNull T e2, @NonNull T e3, @NonNull T e4,
461      @NonNull T e5, @NonNull T e6, @NonNull T e7, @NonNull T e8, @NonNull T e9) {
462    return new ArrayItemN<>(e1, e2, e3, e4, e5, e6, e7, e8, e9);
463  }
464
465  /**
466   * Returns an unmodifiable array item containing ten items.
467   *
468   * @param <T>
469   *          the {@code IArrayItem}'s item type
470   * @param e1
471   *          the first item
472   * @param e2
473   *          the second item
474   * @param e3
475   *          the third item
476   * @param e4
477   *          the fourth item
478   * @param e5
479   *          the fifth item
480   * @param e6
481   *          the sixth item
482   * @param e7
483   *          the seventh item
484   * @param e8
485   *          the eighth item
486   * @param e9
487   *          the ninth item
488   * @param e10
489   *          the tenth item
490   * @return an {@code IArrayItem} containing the specified items
491   * @throws NullPointerException
492   *           if an item is {@code null}
493   */
494  @NonNull
495  static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> of(@NonNull T e1, @NonNull T e2, @NonNull T e3, @NonNull T e4,
496      @NonNull T e5, @NonNull T e6, @NonNull T e7, @NonNull T e8, @NonNull T e9, @NonNull T e10) {
497    return new ArrayItemN<>(e1, e2, e3, e4, e5, e6, e7, e8, e9, e10);
498  }
499
500  /**
501   * Returns an unmodifiable array item containing an arbitrary number of items.
502   *
503   * @param <T>
504   *          the {@code IArrayItem}'s item type
505   * @param items
506   *          the items to be contained in the list
507   * @return an {@code IArrayItem} containing the specified items
508   * @throws NullPointerException
509   *           if an item is {@code null} or if the array is {@code null}
510   */
511  @SafeVarargs
512  @NonNull
513  static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> of(@NonNull T... items) {
514    return items.length == 0 ? empty() : new ArrayItemN<>(items);
515  }
516
517  /**
518   * Returns an unmodifiable array item containing the items of the given
519   * Collection, in its iteration order. The given Collection must not be null,
520   * and it must not contain any null items. If the given Collection is
521   * subsequently modified, the returned array item will not reflect such
522   * modifications.
523   *
524   * @param <T>
525   *          the {@code IArrayItem}'s item type
526   * @param collection
527   *          a {@code Collection} from which items are drawn, must be non-null
528   * @return an {@code IArrayItem} containing the items of the given
529   *         {@code Collection}
530   * @throws NullPointerException
531   *           if collection is null, or if it contains any nulls
532   */
533  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
534  @NonNull
535  static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> copyOf(@NonNull Collection<? extends T> collection) {
536    return collection instanceof IArrayItem
537        ? (IArrayItem<T>) collection
538        : collection.isEmpty()
539            ? empty()
540            : new ArrayItemN<>(new ArrayList<>(collection));
541  }
542
543  @Override
544  default void accept(IItemVisitor visitor) {
545    visitor.visit(this);
546  }
547}
